name: Qmmunity
description:
Qmmunity

The Qs live a modest life. Quiet, quaint and quite quintessentially quirky. The only thing a Q needs is its U.

So what might happen if the Qs were to lose their U? One quivers and quakes to quontemplate...

Take control of a whole group of Qs, bounce and boing your way across perilous platforming sections, solve fiendishly-crafted puzzles, and most importantly, work as a Qmmunity!



Controls

Arrow Keys:   Move + Jump
Spacebar:   Switch to Next Q
Num Keys:   Switch to Specific Q
R:   Restart from Last Checkpoint
Enter:   Start/Pause
